E2. Carter’s Major Contributions to the <hi>TLS</hi><lb/>
It may be useful to extract from the full list, for separate recording here,<lb/>
Carter’s major <hi>TLS</hi> pieces. The list below consists of (1) editorials (unsigned leaders), (2) signed pieces of any length (other than letters), and (3) unsigned pieces<lb/>
